description: This tart is an elegant take on cheese and onion pie and makes a delicious lunch or entree.
keywords: Vegetable pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Goats Cheese, Spinach & Red Onion Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g red onions, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 8-10 minutes until softened. Stir in the balsamic vinegar and honey and cook for 2 minutes, stirring, until absorbed. Set aside to cool slightly.

Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Mix the goats cheese, creme fraiche and spinach together in a large bowl. Unroll the puff pastry and lay it on a parchment paper lined baking sheet. Score a border of 1cm with a knife.
Spread the goats cheese and spinach mix within the border, top with red onions and bake for 20 minutes until puffed and golden.
